sentences.en: After trying the menthol cigarettes he decided to stick to smoking the regular kind.
sentences.cn: 尝试抽薄荷脑香烟后,他决定继续抽原来那种香烟.

sentences.en: Billy: Menthol. It clears your sinuses. Smell.
sentences.cn: 比利: 薄荷脑. 它能让你呼吸顺畅. 闻闻.

sentences.en: Bones meal and menthol oil should be stowed against the fore bulkhead of Hatch No.3 deck.
sentences.cn: 骨粉和薄荷油应紧靠三舱二层舱前壁装.

sentences.en: CONCLUSION l - Menthol promotes the nasal cavity absorption of insulin.
sentences.cn: 结论薄荷醇可促进胰岛素的鼻腔吸收.

sentences.en: Inhalations of menthol may do the trick.
sentences.cn: 吸入薄荷醇或许可以起到作用。

sentences.en: Menthol is one of the ingredients of this kind of food.
sentences.cn: 这类食品中添加了薄荷脑.

sentences.en: Menthol was obtained from lemon eucalyptus oil via cyclization and catalytic hydrogenation.
sentences.cn: 以柠檬桉叶油为主要原料经环化、催化氢化二步反应得到薄荷醇.

sentences.en: Menthol: Crystalline organic compound of the isoprenoid family.
sentences.cn: 薄荷醇: 类异戊间二烯化合物族的结晶有机化合物.

sentences.en: Objective : To improve the identification method of camphor in compound menthol nasal erops.
sentences.cn: 目的: 改进复方薄荷脑滴鼻液中樟脑的鉴别方法.

sentences.en: Objective To a method for determination of mentholatum in menthol spirit.
sentences.cn: 目的建立毛细管气相色谱法测定薄荷脑醑中薄荷脑的含量.

sentences.en: Objective:To establish a GC method for the quantitative determination of menthol(C10H20O)in Compound Apomorphine Hydrochloride Nasal Spray.
sentences.cn: 目的：建立新药复方盐酸阿扑吗啡鼻喷剂中薄荷脑（C10H20O）的含量测定方法。

sentences.en: The menthol in the toothpaste gives a cooling sensation.
sentences.cn: 牙膏中的薄荷油使人感觉到清凉.

sentences.en: The menthol pills are antipyretic and throat - soothing.
They covered the affected parts with menthol.
sentences.cn: 他们在患部涂上薄荷醇.

sentences.en: This is a salve containing menthol.
sentences.cn: 这是一种含有薄荷的药膏。

sentences.en: To date, it always reminds me of you whenever I see a man smoking menthol Marlboro.
sentences.cn: 直到现在, 只要看到吸绿色万宝路烟的男人,我就会想起你.

words.tran_cn: 含薄荷脑的；含薄荷醇的

trans.tran_en: a substance that smells and tastes of  mint  , used to give cigarettes and sweets a special taste
